title: Runner Bean Chutney
ingredients: ['1kg runner beans, chopped into thirds', '4 shallots, halved', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon grated fresh root ginger', '675g dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '1 1/2 tablespoons cornflour', '850ml malt vinegar, divided', '1 pinch chilli powder']
